Html:
I have a project that compile fine with typescript 0.8.0 but with 0.8.1 the typescript compiler returns error code 9009..

How do I solve this ?

Update: I created a new project, tried to compile and get the same error ...

Update : This is the compiler output

Task "Exec"
1> tsc --sourcemap "C:\Projects\VS2010\Testen\TypeScriptHTMLApp1\TypeScriptHTMLApp1\app.ts"
tsc is not recognized as an internal or externale command, program or batch file

The exec command in my project file :
<Exec Command="tsc$(TypeScriptSourceMap) @(TypeScriptCompile ->'"%(fullpath)"', ' ')" />
Apparently, I had to sign off my user and sign on again, to have my PATH settings changed... after installation it still pointed to the 0.8.0 folder.
